EmailTemplate.name: Task:Approval request
EmailTemplate.subject: Approval Request for {!01I61000000v12Z.RecordType}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
You have been assigned as an approver for the {!01I61000000v12Z.RecordType} task of {!IF(NOT(ISBLANK(01I61000000v12Z.00N6100000AGyfL)),'NCR',' ')}{!IF(NOT(ISBLANK(01I61000000v12Z.00N6100000BoYYN)),'CAPA',' ')} record {!01I61000000v12Z.00N6100000AGyfL} {!01I61000000v12Z.00N6100000BoYYN}.
Please log in to the application and complete the approval process by the due date identified.
Please contact {!01I61000000v12Z.00N6100000DVGbe}{!01I61000000v12Z.OwnerFullName} if you have any questions about this assignment and/or non-conformance record.
Thank you.
